title: कर्नाटक के मंगलुरु स्थित मॉल में हाथापाई का वीडियो झूठे और सांप्रदायिक संदेश के साथ साझा
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: A video of an incident of an altercation between two youths was found to be made viral on some SM platforms. Police has taken cognizance, a case is registered and investigation is in progress. Appeal everyone not to misinterpret facts or sensationalize the matter..
